Title: Develop the spirit to wage bitter struggle
Publisher: Shanxi renmin chubanshe (山西人民美术出版社)
Notes: The poster in the background is a picture of Yan'an. The slogan 艰苦奋斗 (Wage bitter struggle) is repeated  in the lettering on the building that can be seen through the window. On the table are volumes of selected works by Marx, Lenin and Mao, and an issue of the theoretical/political journal 红旗 (Red Flag).
